file.name: positive3.yaml
file.content:
openapi: 3.0.0
info:
  title: Simple API overview
  version: 1.0.0
paths:
  "/":
    get:
      operationId: listVersionsv2
      summary: List API versions
      security:
        - petstore_auth:
            - write:pets
            - read:pets
      responses:
        "200":
          description: 200 response
          content:
            application/json:
              examples:
                foo:
                  value:
                    versions:
                      - status: CURRENT
                        updated: "2011-01-21T11:33:21Z"
                        id: v2.0
                        links:
                          - href: http://127.0.0.1:8774/v2/
                            rel: self

Error: parse: parse spec: paths: /: get: operation "listVersionsv2": security: parse operation security: unknown security schema "petstore_auth"
